content: yarn magic_ring with 6 single_crochet stitches /or chain 2 then make 8 single_crochet in the first chain then slip_stitch to make a circle chain 1 round 2 repeat * 1sc increase * 3 times total stitches now is 9 sts continues rounds round 3 repeat *1sc 1sc increase * 3 times total now is 12 sts round 4 repeat *1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc increase* 2 times total 14 sts slip_stitch and finish off
